pageContext.claim: “He even said it was politically biased. He actually said that. The report could have been -- you know who the whistleblower is, and so do you and so does everybody in this room, and so do I. Everybody knows. But they give this whistleblower a status that he doesn't deserve. He's a fake whistleblower.”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no indication the whistleblower — or any of the witnesses who eventually testified — were politically biased. Almost all of the information in the whistleblower’s complaint was confirmed and several of the people who testified worked for the Trump administration. Others had worked for presidents of both parties.
